items.text: Here you find help to learn foreign languages :)
Use the search tool to expand your vocabulary! In order to keep your imersion in your target language, we provide meanings instead of translations :)
We have several games that you can play to practice different competences of your target language!
No registration is needed to access the search tool neither to play our games! However, by signing up, you can participate in our games rankings and compete with other players.
